import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' const Product = ({ product }) => { console.log(product.image) return ( {product.name}
{product.rating} from {product.numReviews}
â‚¹{product.price} ) } export default Product
